name: Infinity Man
description:
This is a game about a man called "INFINITY MAN" as you know infinity means unlimited, and this guy is not "killable" cause he has unlimited HEALTH! The controls are fairly easy, you can control the right and left movement with your arrow keys or your A and D keys, you can fire bullets with your W key for Left-click key, you can jump by pressing your space button.

The goal of this game is fairly simple, the only goal is to not get covered by the grey looking squares, you can compete this between your friends and see who can stay uncovered the longest, I have two versions of the game that can be downloaded,  I have  Normal version which is very hard to control, and if you fall over in this version it is hard to stand back up and the easy difficulty version: in this version you can never fall over.
